import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FaFacebookF, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaGithub, FaDribbble, FaLinkedinIn, } from "react-icons/fa"; const headerData = { name: "Emmanuel Owen", designation: "Web Developer üë®üèæ‚Äçüíª", imageThumb: "/images/logo.png", social: { linkedin: "https://www.linkedin.com/in/emmanuel-owen-0988aa143/", twitter: "https://twitter.com/Owenjnr_", instagram: "hhttps://www.instagram.com/owenjnr_/", github: "https://github.com/Owenjnr", }, }; function Header({ toggleHeader, toggleHandler }) { return ( <>
{headerData.name}
{headerData.name} {headerData.designation}
  • Home
  • About
  • Services
  • Resume
  • Works
    • {/*
  • Blog
    • */}
  • Contact
    {!headerData.social.linkedin ? null : (
    • )} {!headerData.social.twitter ? null : (
    • )} {!headerData.social.instagram ? null : (
    • )} {!headerData.social.github ? null : (
    • )} {/* {!headerData.social.dribbble ? null : (
    • )} */}
© {new Date().getFullYear()} Owenjnr
); } export default Header;
